Interface SparkSession

      • getMemoryAndCores

        ObjectPair<Long,Integer> getMemoryAndCores()
                                    throws Exception
        Get Spark shuffle memory per task, and total number of cores. This information can be used to estimate how many reducers a task can have.
        Returns:
        an object pair, the first element is the shuffle memory per task in bytes, the second element is the number of total cores usable by the client
        Throws:
        Exception

      • isOpen

        boolean isOpen()
        Returns:
        true if the session is open and ready to submit jobs.

      • getConf

        HiveConf getConf()
        Returns:
        configuration.

      • getSessionId

        String getSessionId()
        Returns:
        session id.

        Close session and release resources.
